quotes.quote: Dear Saturday, what is it like knowing every other day of the week wishes it was you?
Saturday night's alright for fighting, get a little action in.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: Dear Saturday, I love you.
Happy weekend! Life is short, grab a friend, and do whatever excites your spirit.
The weekend is a time for nos â€“ no alarm clock, no rushing, no urgent phone calls, no working nights!
Sleeping in on a Saturday always feels like a little bit of heaven.
Sunday is an excellent chance to start living your life to the fullest, do what you want, and forget about consequences.
Happiness is a hot bath on a Sunday afternoon.
Your body constantly tells you what it needs, and if you wake up early on a Saturday morning, it is because the world is calling you to do something fun.
Happy Sunday. Whatever you've got planned, enjoy. Wishing you a restful, peaceful, beautiful day.
The only happy end that I know: it's the weekend!
Oversleep this weekend.
A productive Sunday is the Sunday when you felt and learned something new.
Oh, blessed Sunday, how I long to embrace your quietude, your calmness, and your command to rest.
Saturday night is perfect for writers because other people have plans.
Weekends are when you truly feel alive.
On Sundays, we do nothing.
Sunday is the day when I prepare for the week ahead by making improbable to-do lists and browsing Pinterest for ideas on how to decorate my imaginary mansion.
Have a nice weekend! Remember that a few hours on the beach can fix everything, so take a cocktail and forget about everything.
No! I don't want the weekend to be over.
Hands up if you're ready to do something you'll regret this weekend. Go forth! You have my blessing.
quotes.author: Florence Welch

quotes.quote: I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Forget the things that made you sad and remember those that made you glad. Happy Weekend.
I believe that it should be a mandatory law of the universe for everyone to do something fun on Saturdays.
